content:
I have seen an inconsistency in the standard on how to represent the filter property for a SNOMED Expression Constraint.
There is guidance that states the property value is "constraint" here: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/snomedct.html#4.3.1.0.8.3.
The SNOMED CT canonical code system defines the property code as "expression" https://www.hl7.org/fhir/codesystem-snomedct.html

Which one is the correct property value, "constraint" or "expression"?
you want to make a task to fix?
Sure no problems. Is the process to create a jira task in https://jira.hl7.org/projects/FHIR?
